DOC.brief_summary: Cross-sectional and longitudinal analysis of the somatosensory phenotype, assessed by quantitative sensory testing (QST) and Information obtained by questionnaires to detect risk factors for neuropathic pain development and chronification in painless and chronic pain patients.
DOC.brief_title: The Influence of Sensory Phenotype on the Risk of Developing Neuropathic Pain
DOC.criteria: Chronic peripheral neuropathic pain or Painless Patient with risk to develop neuropathic pain (postsurgery, chemotherapyinduced) Minors
